alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Shelby (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 14 at 1:59PM CDT until June 14 at 2:45PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: The National Weather Service in Birmingham has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Shelby County in central Alabama... East central Jefferson County in central Alabama... * Until 245 PM CDT. * At 159 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Trussville, moving southeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Northeastern Birmingham, Vestavia Hills, Trussville, Irondale, Leeds, Moody, Childersburg, Center Point, Tarrant, Vincent, Harpersville, Shops of Grand River, Alton, Grayson Valley, Vandiver, Barber Motorsports Park, Lake Purdy, Grants Mill Road Bridge, Sterrett and Birmingham Race Course. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 PM CDT for central and east central Alabama. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
